jcr:content.jcr:title: G430 - Reaver
jcr:content.searchTitle: Logitech G430 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech G430 7.1 surround sound gaming headset with lightweight, performance ear cups, and digital USB balances performance and comfort.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G430 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset

media_tile.text: Immerse yourself in amazing audio. G430 comes with both Dolby Headphone and DTS Headphone:X surround sound modes powered by Logitech Gaming Software (LGS). Experience 360-degree audio that makes you feel like you’re right in the middle of the action, so you can detect enemies all around you.

media_tile_654806920.text: Adjust the volume or mute in seconds. Audio controls are located on the 3.2 meter cable, so they are always within reach.

media_tile_777233576.text: The ear cup pivots for a personalized fit, and rotates 90 degrees to lay flat. The lay-flat design makes them easier to transport and more comfortable when resting around the neck.

media_tile_842265300.text: G430 ear pads are covered with sports-performance cloth for a soft-touch comfort, even after hours of use. Slip off the cloth cover to wash, and keep the headset in top shape.

media_tile_1548322686.text: Stay focused on the game, not your headset. G430 ear cups are designed to be slimmer and lighter, without skimping on audio quality. You might even forget you’re wearing them.

media_tile_154832268.text: Be heard loud and clear without the distraction of background noise. Adjust the mic to pick up only your voice so your teammates can hear you loud and clear.

_x0031_.text: Windows<sup>®</sup> 7 or later, Nintendo Switch, PS4<sup>™</sup> or Xbox One<sup>™<sup>

_x0032_.text: USB port or 3.5mm headphone and microphone ports

_x0033_.text: (Optional) Internet connection for Logitech Gaming Software
